title: gift cards problem
body:
i have so problem, i hope someone can help me
i bought a gift card($25), but When I opened it, I accidentally ripped off everything, so i cant see anything
i hope someone can help me, pls

replies.body: Oops!  No worries, we can check it out for you!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a screenshot attached and our billing team will do their best to find some options for you.
